data.message: Hi I have a problem a girl told me that I won a lottery organized by facebook, the girl in question just introduced as an employee at Facebook and said that this lottery is not a trick she stated that the FBI even know of this lottery and that was not a lie, the girl with the soto sends a certificate and a check signed by the president of Facebook. Is it really all that?

replies.message: Hi Miki. This sounds like a hoax. We strongly suggest that you don't provide any personal information and report spam using these tips: http://on.fb.me/1TDlm3F. Thanks. -Rey

Many thanks, but also sent a person with certificate and a check in which the firm of presiden to Facebook, as well as pictures of past winners. If you would like I can send you the photos were sent in messages.
